mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE (TRADE_ID, COIN_ID, SELL_USER_ID, BUY_USER_ID, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{tradeId}, #{coinId}, #{sellUserId}, #{buyUserId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT TRADE_ID, COIN_ID, SELL_USER_ID, BUY_USER_ID, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM TRADE WHERE SELL_USER_ID = #{userId} OR BUY_USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT COIN_ID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS TRADE_VOLUME, MIN(UNIT_PRICE) AS LOWEST_PRICE, MAX(UNIT_PRICE) AS HIGHEST_PRICE FROM TRADE WHERE DATE(CREATED_AT) = DATE(NOW()) GROUP BY COIN_ID;
